about.label: About
about.value: A Data-Driven UI/UX Designer with 3+ years of experience, leveraging user research and human-centered design principles to create intuitive, extensible and user-friendly interfaces through strong teamwork, collaboration and clear communication. Passionate about empathizing and translating user needs into engaging and effective UIs that drive user engagement and business growth. With a strong foundation in computer science engineering and a love for design that aims to make a positive impact. I am always open to feedback and learning.

values.label: Design & Human Computer Interaction
values.skill: Highly proficient in UI designing in Figma and/or similar tools, Design systems and brand identity design, Low and high fidelity wire-framing, Prototyping, Responsive web and native app design, Human-centered UX design, Information architecture design, Heuristic evaluation, Usability testing

values.label: Software Development Life Cycle
values.skill: Requirement analysis, System architecture design, Front-end development, Quality assurance, REST API architecture, Familiar with Agile methodologies & Scrum management

values.label: Soft Qualifications
values.skills: Communication, Collaboration, Empathy, Critical Thinking, Problem Solving, Decision Making, Attention to Detail, Adaptability

responsibilities: Led, managed & trained the UI/UX design team, taking ownership of the design process from concept to execution.
Conducted requirement analysis and collaborated on software design specifications, ensuring smooth alignment between client needs and technical implementation.
Developed information architecture and partnered with backend teams to create system designs and database models.
Working closely with the frontend team including design guides, design reviews, code reviews & developing as well.
Designed UIs, handling the majority of design decisions, including creating wireframes, prototypes, and brand identities.
Led product management, ensuring alignment with client requirements within an Agile Scrum environment.
Conducted usability testing, and manual QA testing, providing detailed reports for continuous improvement.
Conducted client demonstrations & played an instrumental role in recruiting for the UI/UX and Frontend dev teams.
Managed and oversaw the design process of B2B and B2C systems across industries including pharmaceuticals, healthcare, e-commerce, and recruitment management.

values.responsibilities: Responsibilities: Led the UI/UX design of products, Client requirement analysis, Collaboration in system design & database design process, Conducting user researches, User experience designing, User interface mockups and prototype designing, Setting design requirements for frontend teams, Collaborating in software testing, Client demonstrations, Documentation (Requirement analysis, Software design docs, User guidelines etc.), Worked on designing several web based and native applications including ecommerce, telemedicines, freelancing, communication, edtech platforms, management systems etc.
Designing UI/UX of software products based on client requirements, re-iterate based on feedback. Collaboration in system design & database design process. Documenting software design documents.
